description: a[1] = 1, a[m+1] = sum{k = 1 to m} p_k*a[m+1-k], where p_k = k-th prime.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..200
formula: INVERT: a's from b's in 1+Sum a_i x^i = 1/(1-Sum b_i x^i).
mathematica: CoefficientList[ Series[ 1/(1 - Sum[ Prime[ n ]*x^n, {n, 1, 25} ] ), {x, 0, 25} ], x ]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
